delaydefrost_status.description: Indicates whether any supported delay defrost function is active.

delaydefrost_interval.description: Defrost interval as defined by Energy Star.

delaydefrost_stopTime.description: Stop time for the time period, if present interval cannot be present.  This is the time of day at which the delay interval stops.

delaydefrost_startTime.description: Start time for the time period. This is the time of day at which the delay interval starts.
